title: Balearic Islands
summary: The Balearic Islands (/ˌbæliˈærɪk/ BAL-ee-ARR-ik or /bəˈlɪərɪk/ bə-LEER-ik;[1][2] Catalan: Illes Balears [ˈiʎəz bəleˈas]; Spanish: Islas Baleares[3][4][5] [ˈizlaz βaleˈaɾes])[6] are a Spanish archipelago in the Balearic Sea, near the eastern coast of the Iberian Peninsula.
